long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more dealing with annoying pdf links for arXiv! 

Arxiv Redirector streamlines your arXiv browsing by auto-redirecting external links to your chosen default view: Abstract, PDF, or HTML. In case the HTML version is not yet available from arXiv, it will re-direct you to ar5iv automatically. In such a situation, an HTML (ar5iv) link is also added to the abstract page where the HTML (experimental) link is usually present.

To flag issues with the extension, or to contribute, please go to https://github.com/sshkhr/arxiv-redirector
